hillshade(array[, azimuth, angle_altitude]) Generates hillshade from array used by azimuth and angle altitude
classmethod hillshade(array, azimuth=315, angle_altitude=45)[source]¶

Generates hillshade from array used by azimuth and angle altitude

Parameters:
  • array – DEM
  • azimuth – degrees, default 315 deg
  • angle_altitude – degrees, defualt 45 deg
Returns:

a shaded relief of a raster
